definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be short (NH [[קָחֵר]] short, [[קִצֵּר]] shorten; Ar. qas.ara shorten, qas.ura be short, c. 9ano come short of; J Aram. [[קְחַר]] be short);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[קָחַר]] Is 28:20, Mic 2:7 (SS [[קְחַר]] fr. adj. [[קָחֵר]]); 3 fs. [[קָֽחְרָה]] Is 50:2, Is 59:1; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּקְחַר]] Job 21:4 +, 3 fpl. [[תִּקְחׂרְנָה]] Pr 10:27; Inf. abs. [[קָחוֹר]] Is 50:2; Pt. pass. fpl. [[קְחֻרוֹת]] Ez Eze 42:5;—be short, of bed Is 28:20 (fig.), of [[לְשָׁכוֹת]] Ez Eze 42:5; esp. (fig.) of ´[[יַד י]]:, i.e. be ineffective, powerless Nu 11:23 (JE), c. [[מִן]] comp. Is 50:2 (+ inf. abs.), Is 59:1; c. [[בֶפֶשׁ]], [[רוּחַ]], = be impatient (opp. [[[אָרַח]]]

definitions.title: Hiph. 1
definitions.body: (c)): [[נֶפֶשׁ הָעָם]] ´[[וִתִּק]]: Nu 21:4 b (JE), of utter discouragement, cf. (of [[רוּחַ]]) Job 21:4; [[נַפְשׁוֹ]] ´[[וַתִּק]]: Ju Jdg 16:16 i.e. he was worn out (by importunity), so of proph. (representing ´[[י]]:) Zec 11:8 ([[ב]] pers.) reach limit of patience with, endurance of; of ´[[י]]: Ju Jdg 10:16 ([[ב]] rei); ´[[רוּחַ י]] :´[[ק]]: Mic 2:7 (v. supr.); ´[[ק]]: of time † Pr 10:27 (years of wicked).
